General.Name: Advancetek Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Advancetek Enterprise Co.,Ltd. engages in the construction, building, rental, and sale of residential and commercial buildings. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
